name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (Sleeping Daemon)
description:
Dungeon Escape is a short adventure side-scroller platformer game, based on GameDevHQ's Professional Unity Developer Program. It's more of a tech demo to demonstrate that I am a capable Unity Developer programmer and that I can create a finished-looking game, for different platforms,  within a timeframe.

I went through the course material and expanded on it.

- Added more platforms that can only be reached by obtaining a special ability to double jump.

- Added more areas to the given map layout they provided. More areas to explore.

- Added Health Potion to the smuggler shop. 

- Added sounds to the game. The course did not go through the sound process. 

- Skeletons revive within a random time frame (30-120 seconds).

- Added a basic intro to introduce the player to the objective.

- Added some other tweaks that enhance the player experience.

The objective is to obtain the key and escape to the castle.

Abilities: Flamesword (damage from 2 to 3) and  Flight of Boots (Enables Double Jump).

Controls: A and D keys to move left/right. Space to jump. Left Mouse Click to attack.

All art is provided by GameDevHQ.

 Some sounds were downloaded from OpenGameArt.org. I downloaded a fantasy pack by:

www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
